::: {#hero-heading}

Thanks for popping into my little corner of the internet!<br><br>I'm a data analyst with a scientific background, and I love diving into data to uncover valuable **insights**. For over eight years, I've been fortunate to collaborate on international **research projects**, and I've dedicated two years to the world of open-access scholarly publishing. My career goal is simple: I want **to empower** teams to make smarter, data-driven decisions together.

[Learn more about me &rarr;](about.qmd){.about-links}
[Let's have a chat! &rarr;](contact.qmd){.about-links}

:::

### I extend support
Throughout my publishing journey, my focus has been on empowering researchers to amplify their work, disseminate knowledge, and break down publishing barriers at a scale. I strategically developed content for three scholarly journals and built numerous relationships with researchers worldwide, spanning from early-career to senior professionals.
:::
